hadiths.text: Narrated Suwayd ibn Qays: I and Makhrafah al-Abdi imported some garments from Hajar, and brought them to Mecca. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came to us walking, and after he had bargained with us for some trousers, we sold them to him. There was a man who was weighing for payment. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to him: Weigh out and give overweight

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرُّجْحَانِ فِي الْوَزْنِ وَالْوَزْنِ بِالأَجْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Giving A Little More When Weighing And Weighing For A Fee
